name: WFS VOANews translator
author: WebfaceScript

sections.description:
Features:

  • Explaining english word by english phase when user clicks on a word
  • Supporting responsive display for position the mouse clicking point

Admin panel:

  • Plugin could be active or disable
  • Tooltip background color could be changed with 11 colors
  • Supporting catching the post content by content tag css class if user uses a special wordpress theme with different css style

Visis us: webfacescript.com

sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire wfs_voanews_translator folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory or Add New Plugin by upload the wfs_voanews_translator.zip
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

You will find ‘WFS VOANews Translator’ menu in your WordPress admin panel.

short_description: This plugin helps users to easily insert a translator tool in each post content
